content: वात {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [वा-क्त] {@--1@} Blown. {@--2@} Desired or wished for, solicited. --तः {@--1@} Air, wind. {@--2@} The god of wind, the deity presiding over wind. {@--3@} Wind, as one of the three humours of the body. {@--4@} Gout, rheumatism. {@--5@} Inflammation of the joints. {@--6@} A faithless lover (धृष्ट).
